scripts.build-live: npx tsc && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-js: npx terser -c -m -o public/scripts/index.min.js -- public/scripts/index.js && npx terser -c -m -o public/scripts/charts.min.js -- public/scripts/charts.js
scripts.minify-css: npx cleancss -O 2 -o public/styles/index.min.css public/styles/index.css && npx cleancss -O 2 -o public/styles/shared.min.css public/styles/shared.css
